summary:
Just a small overhaul for Argis.
<br />Mybe I make some more male Overhauls.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u]Mods used:[/u][/center]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHairMale[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4869/?]Covereyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No More Blocky Faces[/url]

[center][u]Thanks to:[/u][/center][u]
[/u]All female Skyrim Players and the lack of male Followers.
All the Modders of the Mods I used <3

[center][u]P.S.:[/u][/center][u]
[/u]If there is somebody willing to explain me the secrets to make a standalone version (best if you speak German!) I would be very thankful!
author: Cissney
